name: ENYO Arcade
description: ENYO is trying to let go of an old Dystopia. And it's also a 2d action platformer.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 1 Ghz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Direct X11+ Compatible Card 256 MB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 150 MB available space Additional Notes: Vista will require manual download and install of DirectX 11 if you don't already have this
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Direct X11+ Compatible Card 1 GB DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space Additional Notes: Vista will require manual download and install of DirectX 11 if you don't already have this
